name: pnp-powerautomate-samples-sharepoint-hide-page-title
title: Hide a SharePoint Page Title
shortDescription: This sample flow switches the page layout by updating the PageLayoutType field.
longDescription: This will hide the SharePoint page title, and show it back in case the flow is executed against the same page using the SharePoint Rest API and SharePoint HTTP Action in Power Automate.
